scenes.description: AZKi continues her performance of the song "Inochi" (Life).
Instrumental interlude and visual transition between songs, showcasing AZKi in various settings.
AZKi begins performing the song "Chisana Naru ga Kimeta Koto".

subtitles.original: 鼓動がトクトクしている
subtitles.english: My heart is beating fast

subtitles.original: 叩かれても腐らずに
subtitles.english: Even if I'm criticized, I won't give up

subtitles.original: ここで歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing here

subtitles.original: ボタンひとつの気持ち
subtitles.english: The feeling of a single button

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと覚えててくれるの？
subtitles.english: Will you remember me until the end?

subtitles.original: 消えてしまいそうなの
subtitles.english: It seems like I'm about to disappear

subtitles.original: 分かってよ分かってよ ねえ
subtitles.english: Understand me, understand me, hey

subtitles.original: 淡々と踊るの
subtitles.english: Dancing indifferently

subtitles.original: 恋しさは違うでしょ
subtitles.english: Longing is different, right?

subtitles.original: 君が忘れちゃったら
subtitles.english: If you forget me

subtitles.original: 私は痛くなるの
subtitles.english: I'll start to feel the pain

subtitles.original: 命のような夢を見てるよ
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming a dream like life itself

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye

subtitles.original: 息をしている
subtitles.english: I am breathing

subtitles.original: だから生きてる
subtitles.english: That's why I'm living

subtitles.original: 自己証明を欲しがって 欲しがっているんだ
subtitles.english: I'm longing for, longing for self-proof

subtitles.original: 音が止まって
subtitles.english: The sound stops

subtitles.original: 動かなくなって
subtitles.english: And I stop moving

subtitles.english: I wonder if you'll laugh at me then

subtitles.english: My heart is beating fast

subtitles.original: 嫌われても腐らずに
subtitles.english: Even if I'm hated, I won't give up

subtitles.original: ここで歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing here

subtitles.original: 気分次第な命
subtitles.english: Life that depends on the mood

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと見届けてくれるの？
subtitles.english: Will you watch over me until the very end?

subtitles.original: 褪めてしまいそうなの
subtitles.english: It seems like I'm about to fade away

subtitles.original: 分かってよ分かってよ ねえ
subtitles.english: Understand me, understand me, hey

subtitles.original: 声が聞こえるんだよ
subtitles.english: I can hear your voice

subtitles.original: 塩辛い涙が出ちゃうほど
subtitles.english: So much that salty tears flow out

subtitles.original: 君が忘れちゃったら
subtitles.english: If you forget me

subtitles.original: 私は痛くなるの
subtitles.english: I'll start to feel the pain

subtitles.original: 命のような夢を見てるよ
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming a dream like life itself

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んだあの日を
subtitles.english: That day when I was feeling down

subtitles.original: 軽く弄らないで 止めて
subtitles.english: Don't tease me about it lightly, stop it

subtitles.original: それが生きる糧になるから
subtitles.english: Because that becomes my strength to live

subtitles.original: 大丈夫
subtitles.english: It's okay

subtitles.original: ずっと私は歌い続けるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll keep singing forever

subtitles.original: 最後まで私は生きてるか分からないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know if I'll be alive until the end, but

subtitles.original: 君がくれた言葉は確かに残ってる
subtitles.english: The words you gave me certainly remain

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと覚えててくれるの？
subtitles.english: Will you remember me until the end?

subtitles.original: いつ死んでしまうかなんて 分かんない分かんないよ ねえ
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't know when I'll die, hey

subtitles.original: 痛いくらい気持ちがシンクロする時もあるけど

subtitles.original: またね バイバイ
subtitles.english: See you again, bye-bye

subtitles.original: ちいさななるが決めたこと
subtitles.english: What the little one decided

subtitles.original: あの日選んで君が道は間違いだったんだって 過去恨んでみても
subtitles.english: Even if you regret the past, thinking the path you chose that day was a mistake

subtitles.original: 土砂降りの雨が責めたって
subtitles.english: Even if the downpouring rain blames you
